mathematica: ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[112], 300] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 11 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(10 + x + x^2 + 2 x^3 + x^4 + x^5 + 10 x^6) / (1 - x^6), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 13 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[10, 1, 1, 2, 1, 1, 20]; [n le 7 select I[n] else Self(n-6): n in [1..80]]; Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 14 2013
